Silky Velvet

Article Leigh Modular Sofa

Pros
  • Modular
  • No assembly required
Cons

    The best part about this couch from Article is that all the cushions are uniform and thus reversible, which means you can regularly flip and rotate them to avoid sagging or pancaking.

    Colors: 12 options

    Dimensions: Length: 92 inches; depth: 41 inches

    Seat depth: 27 inches

    Customer review: “Superb material quality. Extremely comfortable. Absolutely love it.”

    Sleeper Sofa

    Serta Sabrina Microfiber 72.6” Rolled Arm Sofa Bed

    Pros
    • Great for guests
    • Free white glove delivery
    • Good for small spaces
    Cons
    • Doesn’t seat more than two people

    This sleek loveseat converts into a queen sized bed, so you can enjoy the same comfort and support that Serta mattresses are known for.

    Colors: Dark Grey, Oatmeal, Steel, Dark Brown

    Dimensions: Length: 72.6 inches; depth: 37.6 inches

    Seat depth: 23.4 inches

    Customer review: “This is the perfect size for a small space. It’s actually comfortable to sit and lay on unlike the traditional pull out couches. I’d definitely recommend this for small spaces and to accommodate guests.”

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    Convert It

    Furniwell Convertible Sectional Sofa Couch

    Pros
    • Affordable & on Amazon
    • Seats aren’t extremely deep
    • Easy to assemble and clean

    While you stock up on groceries and other household necessities, why not go ahead and pick out a new couch? That’s right, Amazon has some of the best couches on the internet.

    Colors: Grey, White

    Dimensions: Length: 110 inches; depth: 44.1 inches

    Seat depth: 23.6 inches

    Customer review: “We’ve already had an guest ask us for the link so they can buy it, too.”

    Under $350

    VanAcc 89” Sofa with Extra Deep Seats

    Pros
    • Affordable
    • Easy assembly
    Cons
    • Might be difficult to clean

    The luster of bouclé furniture hasn’t faded one bit since it’s 2021 comeback, and this budget-friendly option is available right on Amazon.

    Colors: Beige Chenille, Gray Chenille, Gray Bouclé, Off-White Bouclé

    Dimensions: Length: 89 inches; depth: 35 inches

    Seat depth: 24 inches

    Customer review: “Extremely comfortable and looks great. I originally planned on replacing in about six months, but I expect this couch will stay for as long as it holds up. Very easy to put together, no tools needed. Love this couch.”

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    Under $800

    The Twillery Co. Alcantara 89.5" Square Arm Sofa

    Cons
    • Only available in corduroy fabric
    • Sits low

    You certainly don’t have to spend $1,000 or more on a sofa. There are lots of high-quality options to fit almost any budget, including this cozy corduroy option.

    Colors: Light Gray, Dark Gray, Beige, Ginger, Dark Green

    Dimensions: Length: 89.5 inches; depth: 41.5 inches

    Seat depth: 27 inches

    Customer review: “I am SO impressed. I would buy this couch again that’s how happy I am with it. Came in a huge box all I had to do was put the legs on it. So soft and comfortable. Perfect for small space. Does sit low to the ground. Perfect cuddle couch! Everything I wanted.”

    Ultra Plush

    West Elm Harmony Sofa

    Pros
    • Customize it
    • Plush
    • Can opt for extra deep seats
    Cons
    • Might be too soft for some

    This West Elm sofa is one of the best cloud couch dupes, as tested by the Good Housekeeping Institute. At a fraction of the cost of the original, don’t mind if I do...

    Colors: More than 100 options

    Dimensions: Customized options ranging from 76 to 104 inches

    Seat depth: 41 inches for standard; 47 inches for extra deep

    Customer review: “This sofa literally ticks all of my boxes.”

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    Best Overall

    Joybird Lewis Sofa

    Pros
    • Customize it
    • Tons of colors and materials to choose from
    Cons

      My friends at the Good Housekeeping Institute tested a whole bunch of deep couches and crowned this one from Joybird as the best in show. What better endorsement could you hope for?

      Colors: 82 options

      Dimensions: Length: 83 inches; depth: 41 inches

      Seat depth: 28 inches

      Customer review: “This sofa couldn’t be more perfect! It’s incredibly deep. The texture of the fabric is perfect—soft and inviting....Everyone who sits on it immediately hates their own sofa. Sorry!”

      Apartment Friendly

      Sundays Company Movie Night 2-Piece Modular Sofa

      Pros
      • Moisture-repellent and stain-resistant
      • Free delivery and assembly
      • Good for small spaces

      Anyone who has lived in a small space knows the difficulty of finding good furniture that fits. This one is such good quality that you’ll want to bring it with you even if you upgrade your abode.

      Colors: 8 options

      Dimensions: Length: 76 inches; depth: 38 inches (for standard size)

      Seat depth: 19 inches

      Customer review: “The Movie Night couch is a stylish and comfortable addition to any living space. Compared to my Restoration Hardware Cloud couch, I find the Movie Night to have a slightly firmer base, which is beneficial for sitting upright and entertaining guests. The fabric is also incredibly soft and the cushions are filled with the perfect amount of feathers for both structure and comfort.”

      Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

      Made In America

      Anthropologie Meriwether Sofa

      Anthropologie might not be most famous for its furniture, but this made-to-order couch is no joke. The customization options are endless, and the reviews are incredible.

      Colors: More than 100 options

      Dimensions: Length: 96 inches; depth: 48 inches

      Seat depth: 31 inches

      Customer review: “The Meriwether sofa is a dream! Stylish, comfy, and spacious—its wide cushions are like a twin bed. Perfect for guests, pets, and cozy nights in. It suits any decor, and my dog loves it! A must-have for style and comfort. Highly recommended!”

      Cool Leather

      Pottery Barn Carmel Lounge Square Arm Leather Return Bumper Sectional

      Pros
      • Available in two sizes and lots of colors/fabrics
      • Leather wipes clean

      If you prefer leather to fabric textiles, that’s justified. Nothing can compare to the cool softness of a leather couch that has been perfectly broken in.

      Colors: 45 options

      Dimensions: Length: 117 inches; depth: 82 inches

      Seat depth: 28 inches

      Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

      Reclining Seats

      Homebody Coconut 3 Seat Sectional with 1 Recliner

      Pros
      • Recliners
      • Modular
      • 100-day trial

      Homebody specializes in modular couches that are intended to evolve with you and your home. Buy a loveseat now and convert it to a six-seater a few years down the line. These couches can do it all.

      Colors: 7 options

      Dimensions: Length: 128.4 inches; depth: 39 inches

      Seat depth: 32.7 inches

      Customer review: “It has exceeded all my expectations. The customization options are so convenient. I couldn’t be happier with my purchase. This is definitely one of the best investments I have made.”

      What should I consider when buying a deep couch?

      • Dimensions. First things first, co-founder and COO of Homebody, Shuang Liang, recommends carefully measuring your space. “A deep couch can dominate a room, so it is important to note not only the width and depth but also the height,” she says.
      • Silhouette. Do you prefer a lofty couch or one that sits low to the ground? “Remember that seat depth and seat height are directly related and the deeper the sofa, the lower the seat height should be or comfort will be sacrificed,” explains Paulo Kos, vice president of design and development at The Citizenry. “Aesthetically, a low deep silhouette can lean more modern and relaxed while taller, shallower styles can be a bit more formal in look.”
      • Cushion type. You want a couch that offers both comfort and durability. “Look for high-density foam or down-filled cushions and durable upholstery fabrics,” Liang advises. “If you like to sink in while also feeling a little bit of bounce and support, look for cushions that combine down and several types of foam. The down provides softness while the foam provides longevity and support, working together to provide the best experience.”
